attributes.action: Save Christmas (the birth of Jesus Christ, our saviour) from Islamic Persecution
attributes.background: Prevent the religious persecution of Christian holidays, such as Christmas. Pass a legalisation that allows the religious freedom to celebrate Christmas for Christians across Britain without fear of hate-crimes and religious discrimination. Protect our tradition to spread joy and love

rejection.details: It's not clear what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. It is already legal to celebrate Christmas in the UK.
